rows.name: Accordion
rows.description: Displays collapsible content panels for presenting information in a limited amount of space

rows.name: Button
rows.description: Enhances standard form elements like buttons, inputs and anchors to themeable buttons with appropriate hover and active styles.

rows.name: Dialog
rows.description: Open content in an interactive overlay.

rows.name: Menu
rows.description: Themeable menu with mouse and keyboard interactions for navigation.

rows.name: Slider
rows.description: Drag a handle to select a numeric value

rows.name: Tab
rows.description: A single content area with multiple panels, each associated with a header in a list.
